definition: Xintang, common town or village name/Xintang village in Guangdong province
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
new/newly/meso- (chemistry)

sentences.english: New pond is known for its jeans production base.
sentences.chinese: 新塘是聞名世界的牛仔服生產基地。

sentences.english: A large-scale riot happened in Guangzhou Xintang, June 12.
sentences.chinese: 廣州增城新塘連續三晚發生大規模抗議示威。
